reviews.text:
To the man in the ticket office: cheers for putting a downer on my New Year’s celebrations. Never have I ever experienced such awful customer service. My visually impaired friend struggled to read the train departures board and asked for help to which the man in the ticket office just pointed at the screen rather than offering any guidance. 
Seeing other reviews I’m not sure how he still has his job. We’ll be using the ticket machine next time!
Fantastic and beautiful Great Western railway station!
We missed our train because of unacceptable queuing time, the man in the ticket booth did not know he was doing, and should take retirement soon. Very unhappy with the service.

The scenery alone around this station is worth the five stars alone,not forgetting to mention as it’s So closely located to the high street with your local shops where you can go for a short walk as you wait on your train.
Terrible customer service from Paul, wanted to charge me more money for my ticket compared to the online price.
